description: This file defines the main App component for a React-based web application. It includes routing, theme toggling, and links to other parts of the app, serving as the entry point and layout for the frontend interface.

methods.name: Home()
methods.description: A functional component that renders the home landing page with a title, description, and link to the RAG Demo.

methods.name: App()
methods.description: Main application component managing theme state, routing, and layout structure.

methods.name: toggleTheme
methods.description: A function to toggle the theme state between 'light' and 'dark'.
